text:
Several `warnings.warn` calls do not specify the category.

By default, python will not show `DeprecationWarning` so it would  be better to use : 

`warnings.warn(warn_str, np.VisibleDeprecationWarning, stacklevel=2)`
title: Add VisibleDeprecationWarning from numpy in warn calls
clean_text: sever call specifi categori By default python show would better use
